description:
Stylescapes improved my communication a lot with clients. There wasn't a template out there for Figma so I created. It will save you a couple of seconds to get started.


Want to learn more about Stylescapes?

  • https://thefutur.com/video/how-to-design-brand-identity-stylescapes

*This is not my concept and I don't have any affiliation with the Futur, or the Skool. All the credits for this amazing concept are for the Futur, Chris Do and Jose Caballer.
